```{r setup, include = FALSE}
# Define knitr options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo=FALSE)

# Set any NA'sin tables to blank 
options(knitr.kable.NA = "")
# load packages
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(ggthemes)
# load surve data set
data('steak survey',package='fivethirtyeight')
# Create Mountain subset with no missing data
sdat <- na.omit(steak_survey) %>% filter(region == ' Mountain')
```
